org.kahina.tralesld.bridge

Class AuxiliaryTraleInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.kahina.tralesld.bridge.AuxiliaryTraleInstance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class AuxiliaryTraleInstance
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class uses the Jasper interface to run and maintain a second instance of TRALE. This parallel instance is used to generate MGUs and MGSs for FSs on the workbench.
    Author:
    jdellert

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AuxiliaryTraleInstance(boolean newInstance)
      Crudely gains access to some SICStus instance (caller or new) and stores it for operations.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AuxiliaryTraleInstance

        public AuxiliaryTraleInstance(boolean newInstance)
        Crudely gains access to some SICStus instance (caller or new) and stores it for operations. Creating a second instance requires the environment variable PROLOGMAXSIZE to be set

        public boolean compileGrammar(java.lang.String fileName)
        Lets the instance compile a grammar in the current working directory.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file name
        Returns:
        true if compilation succeeded, false in case of exception

      • discardGrammar

        public void discardGrammar()
        Lets the instance discard the currently compiled grammar.

        public java.lang.String getLemmata()
        Returns all the lemmata defined in the current theory.
        Returns:
        a String of lemma strings separated by colons

      • getSignature

        public TraleSLDSignature getSignature(java.lang.String fileName)
        Lets the instance compile and return a signature from a file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the file name
        Returns:
        a TraleSLDSignature object representing the signature in the file.

      • getCurrentSignature

        public TraleSLDSignature getCurrentSignature()
        Reads out the current signature (usually after theory compilation).
        Returns:
        a TraleSLDSignature object representing the current signature;

      • loadEmbeddedKahinaInstance

        public void loadEmbeddedKahinaInstance()
        For testing purposes: Loads another instance of Kahina inside the embedding instance. The environment must be configured with TRALE_ACTIVATE_DEBUGGER set to true.
